# init(meshResource:)

**Initializer**

Creates a mapping from the given MeshResource.

## Declaration

```swift
init(meshResource: MeshResource)
```

## Parameters

- **meshResource**: The definition of the mesh from which to build the mapping.
title: init(meshResource:)
